attributes.action: A vote of no confidence for First Minister Nicola Sturgeon.
attributes.additional_details: She continuously ignores the 'once in a generation referendum' There are more important matters to be addressed within Scotland than leaving the UK. Such as Healthcare, Education, how to protect the oil industry etc.
attributes.background: The First Ministers only focus is her own political agenda and she is not acting towards the best interests of the people of Scotland.

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
